body.p: Paragraph 24 of IAS 12 requires an entity to recognise deferred tax assets only ‘to the extent that it is probable that taxable profit will be available against which the deductible temporary difference can be utilised’ (the recoverability requirement). Because of the recoverability requirement, sometimes equal taxable and deductible temporary differences might result in an entity recognising unequal amounts of deferred tax assets and liabilities.
